languages.text: {n}Авель с достоинством склоняет голову. Кажется, он не уловил подтекста вашего высказывания.{/n}
{n}Abel bows his head with dignity. It seems the undertone of your words was lost on him.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Авель с достоинством склоняет голову. Кажется, он не уловил подтекста вашего высказывания.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アベルは威厳ある態度で会釈した。あなたの抑えた声は彼には通じないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abel bows his head with dignity. It seems the undertone of your words was lost on him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベルは威厳ある態度で会釈した。あなたの抑えた声は彼には通じないようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}亚伯向你低了下头，看起来并没有太在意你说的话。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abel bows his head with dignity. It seems the undertone of your words was lost on him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}亚伯向你低了下头，看起来并没有太在意你说的话。{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel senkt würdevoll den Kopf. Den Unterton in deinen Worten hat er anscheinend nicht registriert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abel bows his head with dignity. It seems the undertone of your words was lost on him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel senkt würdevoll den Kopf. Den Unterton in deinen Worten hat er anscheinend nicht registriert.{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel incline dignement la tête. De toute évidence, les sous-entendus de vos propos lui échappent complètement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abel bows his head with dignity. It seems the undertone of your words was lost on him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel incline dignement la tête. De toute évidence, les sous-entendus de vos propos lui échappent complètement.{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel inclina la cabeza con dignidad. No parece haber captado el tono implícito de tus palabras.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abel bows his head with dignity. It seems the undertone of your words was lost on him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel inclina la cabeza con dignidad. No parece haber captado el tono implícito de tus palabras.{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel, ağırbaşlılıkla başını eğiyor. Sözlerinle ifade etmek istediğin asıl anlam ona geçmemiş gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abel bows his head with dignity. It seems the undertone of your words was lost on him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel ağırbaşlılıkla başını eğiyor. Sözlerindeki alt anlam ona geçmemiş gibi görünüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
